sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
If it is given that \((48 a ^2 - 28 b ^2 ):(ab ) = 32 : 1 \). Find the ratio of \(a : b \).
\newline
", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	(48 a ^2 - 28 b ^2 ):(ab ) = 32 : 1 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\input[s1v1]{} a ^2 - 28 b ^2 }{ab } = \frac{32}{1}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[
	48 a ^2 - 28 b ^2 = \input[s2v1]{} ab 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 48 a ^2 - (\input[s3v1]{} )ab - 28 b ^2 = 0
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 48 a ^2 -32ab - 28 b ^2 = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 48 a ^2 + \input[s4v1]{} ab - \input[s4v2]{} ab - 28 b ^2 = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 6a (\input[s5v1]{}a + \input[s5v2]{}b) - 7b (8a + 4b) = 0
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow (8 a + 4 b )(6 a - 7 b ) = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (8 a + \input[s6v1]{} b ) = 0 \text{ or} (\input[s6v2]{} a - 7 b ) = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "

\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{a }{b } = \frac{-4 }{\input[s7v1]{} }
\]
Or, 
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{a }{b } = \frac{\input[s7v2]{} }{6 }
\]
\newline
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [48], "text": "$$\text{The expression $ (48 a ^2 - 28 b ^2 ):(ab ) = 32 : 1 $ can be written as $ frac{48 a ^2 - 28 b ^2 }{ab } = \frac{32}{1} $}.$$"}, {"data": [32], "text": "$$\text{Upon cross_multiplication and simplification we get $ 48 a ^2 - 28 b ^2 = 32 ab $}$$"}, {"data": [32], "text": "$$\text{Bringing all the terms on the left hand side we get $ 48 a ^2 - (32 )ab - 28 b ^2 = 0$ which can be written as $48 a ^2 -32ab - 28 b ^2 = 0$.}$$"}, {"data": [24, 56], "text": "$$\text{ Upon finding factors the exprssion can be written as $ 48 a ^2 + 24 ab - 56 ab - 28 b ^2 = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [8, 4], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking common factors out we get $ (8 a + 4 b )(6 a - 7 b ) = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [4, 6], "text": "$$\text{Any factor can be zero, thereforee, $ (8 a + 4 b ) = 0$ or (6 a - 7 b ) = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [8, 7], "text": "Upon simplifying the two equalities we get $\frac{a }{b } = \frac{-4 }{8 }$ or $\frac{a }{b } = \frac{7 }{6 }$ "}]
